com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.frontier
Class DefaultStatisticsService

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.frontier.DefaultStatisticsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatisticsService
public class DefaultStatisticsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticsService

Default statistics service implementation. BerkleyDB is used to store statistics.

Author:
ameshkov
